song_name: Show Me What I'm Looking For
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Show Me What I'm Looking For has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion:
Show Me What I'm Looking For is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
